column1: :Note: The Gregorian calendar does not contain a 30th of February so no events have nor will happen on February 30th.
**The Entmoot summoned by Treebeard begins in Fangorn Forest.
**When Éomer returns to Edoras he meets Aragorn on his way. He tells them about the Orcs. He allows them to continue their quests and leaves them the horses of the fallen
**In the evening the Three Hunters encounter Saruman from afar and the horses flee.
**Gríma forbids entrance to strangers and Éomer is prisoned in Edoras for his disobedience.
